tech1: class="a-keyvalue prodDetTable" role="presentation"> Brand Go Power! Item Weight 19 pounds Product Dimensions 16.6 x 8.2 x 6.5 inches Item model number GP-SW2000-12 Manufacturer Part Number GP-SW2000-12 Folding No Bulb Type LED
description: Go Power! 2000-Watt Pure Sine Wave Inverter takes 12 volt DC battery power and converts it to an exact replica of AC houshold power. It is guarenteed to run any load within their wattage rangeand has a 2 year warranty. This inverter has two GFCI outlets and can use the GP-DC-KIT4 to connect to the batteries with ease. As long as the load is not greater then 2000 watt this inverter will run it and the GP-SW2000-12 can surge to 4000 watt as well as contains all instructions required.
title: Go Power! GP-SW2000-12 2000-Watt Pure Sine Wave Inverter
feature: 2000 watt continuous pure sine wave inverter 12 volt input
2 GFCI protected outlets and hardwire port
Over voltage, under voltage and overload protections
